title: Old URF or new URF?
body: Can we get old urf back tho? I get it that some ppl enjoy the new URF but why cant we have the option to pick from ARURF and normal URF. I just rly dont like this one so much. I just want to play the camps that I like not ****  {{champion:41}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:240}}  + some champs just are better then others and this is why in the original URF we had bans.
